en: Got {cost} coins? I'll forge you some {type} armor in {turns} turns!
I can remove an Omen and get rid of your negative morality for {cost} coins!
Even soldiers of God need to eat!
Give me {cost} coins and I'll help you out...
I can activate your mastery's ultimate ability for {cost} coins...
I'll bet you {cost} coins that I can move to a hidden cell without getting hurt! If I'm wrong, well, you can have whatever I've got.
I will restore {lives} life for {cost} coins, but you'll owe me {fee} more when you leave.
I will restore {lives} lives for {cost} coins, but you'll owe me {fee} more when you leave.
Don't forget, you still owe me {fee} coins! Need another heal? I will restore {lives} life for {cost} coins, but then you'll owe a total of {new_fee} coins later.
Don't forget, you still owe me {fee} coins! Need another heal? I will restore {lives} lives for {cost} coins, but then you'll owe a total of {new_fee} coins later.
I will cast {item} on a random cell for {cost} coins!
I seem to have lost my {item}!
I need {mana} more mana before I can cast {item} again!
I will add 1 to each of your heirlooms for {cost} coins!
I will copy your first {slot.count} items into their heirloom slots for {cost} coins!
I will reactivate your heirloom slots for {cost} coins!
Flares are my thing!! Give me {cost} coins and I'll rotate clockwise!
I love bubbles! Pay me {cost} coins and I'll move over one cell.
Give me {cost} coins and I will fight for you!
